messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] World Cup Lego
messages.msgSnippet: I might be doing the informal Lego club yahoo group for our local area and have been looking around online at fun Lego stuff for Karl who has been on a Lego
messages.messageBody:
I might be doing the informal Lego club yahoo group for our local area
and have been looking around online at fun Lego stuff for Karl who has
been on a Lego marathon at Youtube watching all his faves such as Star
Wars, Atlantis, Indiana Jones, Prince of Persia.

Found something I really thought was great for ME since I have been
reading A Briefer History of Time: a portrait of Stephen Hawking.

http://legoisfun.blogspot.com/2007/09/lego-portrait-of-stephen-hawking.html

~Katherine

For all you football (soccer) fans and Lego fans, here are highlights
of the USA vs England game, complete with replays and play-by-play!:
